mapper.select: SELECT DONA_NO, MEMBER_ID, DONA_PRICE, DONA_DATE, DONA_NICKNAME FROM DONATION
SELECT DONA_NICKNAME, SUM(DONA_PRICE) AS DONA_PRICE FROM DONATION WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_id} GROUP BY DONA_NICKNAME

SELECT TO_CHAR(DONA_DATE, 'MM"월" DD"일"') AS DONA_DATE, SUM(DONA_PRICE) AS DONA_PRICE FROM DONATION WHERE DONA_NICKNAME = #{dona_nickname} AND DONA_DATE IN (SELECT TO_DATE('2020-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL - 1 AS DONA_DATE FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL < (TO_DATE('2020-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE('2020-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') + 1)) GROUP BY DONA_DATE ORDER BY DONA_DATE
